content: provide good enough contrasts it is a good combination © 2021 anna-sofia vintersol @loparefur totorosweater body cast on 144 160 176 192 208 224 240 256 272 stitches with size 3 5 mm in color 2 place a stitch mark- er to mark the start of the round and work 3 rounds rib 2 k 2 p change to color 4 and work 3 rounds rib 2 k 2 p change to color 1 and continue in rib until piece measures 10 cm change to needle size 4 5 mm and contin- ue in stockinette st until piece measures 25 25 26 28 29 30 32 33 35 cm for women and 30 30 31 33 34 35 37 38 40 cm for men place a stitch marker at the beginning of the round to mark one side and one after 72 80 88 96 104 112 120 128 136 stitches for the other side insert a stitch marker on each side and knit chart a 1 from here work back and forth or cast on 2 cutting stitches between each part so that you can knit in a round with circular needle and later cut up to armhole continue with chart a 2 set the middle 45 46 45 46 48 48 50 50 50 stitches from the front piece and the middle 45 46 45 46 48 48 50 50 50 stitches from the back piece on a 40 cm needle 3 5 mm you should now have 90 92 90 92 96 96 100 100 100 stitches set the work aside and knit the sleeves tips feel free to adjust chart a 2 so that the pattern is centered between the stitch markers the pattern a doesnt add up on the sides in all row - it wont be noticable once the sweater is completed © 2021 anna-sofia vintersol @loparefur totorosweater arms cast on 36 36 40 40 40 44 44 44 44 sts on needle size 3 5 mm with color 2 place a stitch marker to mark the start of the round and work 3 rounds rib 2 k 2 p change to color 4 and work 3 rounds rib 2 k 2 p change to color 1 and work rib until piece measures 10 cm change to needle 4 5 mm knit 1 round and work chart b 1 continue in stocking st while increase 2 sts on underside of sleeve 1 st after the first st on round and 1 st before the last st on round repeat this every 4th round a total of 22 22 20 20 20 23 23 23 23 times you should now have 60 60 72 72 72 84 84 96 96 stitches continue to sleeve 25 25 26 28 29 30 32 33 35 cm for women and 30 30 31 33 34 35 37 38 40 cm for men or to desired length work pattern according to diagram b 2 - sleeve loosely bind off
